sentences.english: A real winner since 1979, we combine Vanilla-flavored and Chocolate ice creams with a caramel ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 香草冰淇淋和巧克力冰淇淋加上焦糖丝。

sentences.english: That may be a better claim to fame than even caramel corn.
sentences.chinese: 这甚至可能比焦糖玉米还有助于赚得名声。

sentences.english: If like, sweetmeats can have caramel pineapple group.
sentences.chinese: 假如喜欢甜品可以吃焦糖菠萝圈。

sentences.english: Caramel is sugar syrup cooked until it turns a light, nut brown.
sentences.chinese: 把糖酱烧至浅浅的类似坚果的褐色时就是焦糖了。

sentences.english: JOYCE Creme caramel . And coffee. Hot coffee.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊斯奶油焦糖，还有咖啡，热咖啡。

sentences.english: My wife likes them more than the creams and caramels.
sentences.chinese: 我太太较喜欢果仁，不大喜欢奶油和焦糖。

sentences.english: In contrast to previous moves, the new pledge will not include the caramel dip for fruit.
sentences.chinese: 此次的新推出的套餐里，将不再推出沾焦糖的水果片。

sentences.english: Serve puddings warm or at room temperature with whipped cream and warm caramel sauce.
sentences.chinese: 将奶油和热焦糖搅拌，和温过或常温布丁一起呈上。

sentences.english: And this is the exhibition of chocolate and caramel art.
sentences.chinese: 这是一组巧克力和焦糖制成的艺术品展览。

sentences.english: Slowly, traces of toffee, caramel and dusty leather emerge.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地，太妃糖，焦糖和尘土飞扬的皮革痕迹出现。

sentences.english: It has pear, apple and subtle hints of caramel and oak flavors.
sentences.chinese: 梨子，苹果与一丝淡淡的焦糖与橡木口味芳醇复杂。

sentences.english: Her crown, bouquet and necklace were made from caramelized(8) sugar.
sentences.chinese: 新娘的头冠，花束和项链都是用焦糖做的。

sentences.english: Valrhona Chocolate Tart, Herbs Caramel, Yuzu Sorbet.
sentences.chinese: 法芙娜巧克力塔，香草焦糖，柚珠冰沙。

sentences.english: But don’t blame the caramel flavoring entirely.
sentences.chinese: 但你不要全把责任推到“焦糖”上。

sentences.english: Once the custard coats the back of a spoon, stir into the cooled caramel.
sentences.chinese: 一旦牛奶沙司能裹住勺子背后了就搅进冷焦糖。

sentences.english: The caramel mix into the Latte, have a great taste. Gently sip, eyes closed.
sentences.chinese: 拿铁里加入了焦糖，轻轻地啜一口，闭上眼。

definition: macaron, French pastry with a soft filling sandwiched between the meringue-based cookie shells (loanword)
